markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Apotropaic Fulu](/Equipment.aspx?ID=971)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Fulu" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=378" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 159 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 25 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed over an entrance

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This unassuming yellow paper, affixed above a door or gate, flickers in the light. Pick an alignment trait: [chaotic](/Traits.aspx?ID=25), [good](/Traits.aspx?ID=83), [lawful](/Traits.aspx?ID=99), or [evil](/Traits.aspx?ID=64). When a creature with the opposing alignment trait of the fulu (good for an evil fulu, and so on) passes through the entrance, it must succeed at a DC 17 Fortitude save or become [sickened 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34); regardless of whether they succeed, the creature becomes temporarily immune for 1 day.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Apotropaic Fulu

text: <title level="1" right="Item 5" pfs="Standard" > Apotropaic Fulu Source Secrets of Magic pg. 159 1.1 Price 25 gp Usage affixed over an entrance --- This unassuming yellow paper, affixed above a door or gate, flickers in the light. Pick an alignment trait: chaotic, good, lawful, or evil. When a creature with the opposing alignment trait of the fulu (good for an evil fulu, and so on) passes through the entrance, it must succeed at a DC 17 Fortitude save or become sickened 2; regardless of whether they succeed, the creature becomes temporarily immune for 1 day.
